Package edu.odu.cs.cs350

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.odu.cs.cs350.Book
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Author>
    public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Author>
    A book object as it might be recorded in a publisher's catalog or a library.

    This is not a capture of the contents of the book, but of the metadata that describes the book: authors, title, etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Book()
      Create a "blank" book with empty strings for title, publisher, ISBN and an empty (zero-length) list of authors.
      Book​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String publisher, java.lang.String isbn, Author[] authors)
      Create a new book.
